subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: After missing the Masters last year because of a resurgence of rheumatoid arthritis, José María Olazábal is back in the field this year for the major tournament that he won in 1994 and 1999.
snippet: After missing the Masters last year because of a resurgence of rheumatoid arthritis, José María Olazábal is back in the field this year for the major tournament that he won in 1994 and 1999.
